alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 3:12AM MDT until March 14 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Bitterroot/Sapphire Mountains. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. A period of heavy snow with snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hours is expected between 2am and 6am, bringing low visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
